page.title: 20HOLIDAYS
page.content: Most people go on holidays about once a year. Farm workers can't go on holiday at all sometimes because of the milking and the farming. Some people go on holiday twice a year if they're lucky. We go on holiday once a year. We usually go on holiday in Britain. I have only been abroad once for a holiday. We found out where families of children in this school went for their holidays last year. Out of 56 families, 43 had a holiday. Thirteen families spent their holiday abroad and thirty families spent their holidays in Britain. Some people like to go to the seaside for their holidays. Whilst others like to go on walking holidays. Some children go on adventure holidays without their parents and do cricket, football, climbing and golf.
